text: Picked a tomato a little too soon? Place any fruit in your kitchen next to bananas and they will help ripen it by producing ethylene.
Always make space for flowers. Flowers attract polinators and add a splash of color and whimsy to your urban garden.
Container gardens are not immune to weeds - some of them may come with your compost. Pull weeds reguraly to keep your garden looking its best.
Befriend mulch. Straw, grass clippings or good quality wood chips help supress the weeds and keep the soil moist for longer.
Be ready for bugs. Treating insect problems early is key. Keep some gentle products such as neem oil or diatomaceous earth on hand.
